abstract: Not that Tony  Romo's detractors  will care, but two of his second-half interceptions in Sunday's disaster against the Lions were explainable, perhaps even understandable.
snippet: Not that Tony  Romo's detractors  will care, but two of his second-half interceptions in Sunday's disaster against the Lions were explainable, perhaps even understandable.

headline.main: Week 4 Quick Hits: In Defense of Tony Romo
